title: Key West to Cuba Festival
seo_description: The Marker Waterfront Resort is the proud lodging sponsor of the 1st Annual Key West to Cuba festival happening in two of the most vibrant, sought-after, tropical destinations in the South.
short_description: The Marker Waterfront Resort is the proud lodging sponsor of the 1st Annual Key West to Cuba festival happening in two of the most vibrant, sought-after, tropical destinations in the South.
contents: The Marker Waterfront Resort is the proud lodging sponsor of the 1st Annual Key West to Cuba festival happening in two of the most vibrant, sought-after, tropical destinations in the South. Enjoy dinners, pool parties, rum distillery tours, art and shopping all within walking distance of our resort during this fun weekend. The Marker will be hosting a few events over the weekend – so book your room today for your front row seat!
